name: Wildwood (Ogdred)
description:
Wildwood is a short anthology visual novel about fairy tales and folklore from Europe, Britain and Russia. 

Features:

  • Retellings of four different fairy tales. 
  • Two different endings.
  • Branching dialogue.
  • Hand drawn art.

Made using Fungus for Unity. 

Music and sound effects by:

Death of an Octopus - slowed 20 percent by Nicholas The Octopus Camarena

Dark Ambience by Patrick Lieberkind

20060706.night.forest02.flac by Dobroide
